awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 5 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A pre-fame Beatles head for the seedy clubs of Hamburg in search of success. The band meet up with a group of trendy German beatniks, one of whom (Astrid Kircherr) bass guitarist Stuart Sutcliffe falls in love with. Whilst best friend John Lennon can only watch, Sutcliffe has to choose between rock 'n roll and a new life in Germany...
plot: A dramatization of the Hamburg, Germany phase of the Beatles' early history.
title: Backbeat
